text: junimkkeseo geunyeoleul gakkai su laghasa geunyeoga sungyeolhago aleumdabge seongjanghadolog sagalalo hayeogeum dol bodolog hasyeossnola geuga geunyeoui yo lam-e deul-eogass-eul ttaemada geunyeoege meog-eul yangsig-i iss-eum-eul balgyeonhagoseo malhagil maliayeo igeos-i eodiseo wassneunyo lagwa hani geunyeoga malhagil hananim-eulobuteo on geos-ibnida hana nim-eun geubun-i wonhaneun ja-ege pungseonghan-yangsig-eul juobnida lago malhadeola
